description:
Conduct a thorough research on ^GSPC. Your analysis should include:
 1. Current stock price and historical performance (5 years).
 2. Key financial metrics (P/E, EPS growth, revenue growth, margins).
 3. Recent news and press releases (1 month).
 4. Analyst ratings and price targets (min 3 analysts).
 5. Reddit sentiment analysis (100 posts).
 6. Major institutional holders and recent changes.
 7. Competitive landscape and ^GSPC's market share.
 Use reputable financial websites for data.
name: research_task
expected_output: A detailed 200-word research report with data sources and brief analysis.
summary:
Conduct a thorough research on ^GSPC. Your analysis should include:
...

json_dict.researchreport: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is currently trading around 5,405.97 (Yahoo Finance). The average stock market return for the last 5 years was approximately 13.6% to 16.5%. The S&P 500 P/E ratio is currently at 27.99 (YCharts). For CY 2026, analysts are projecting earnings growth of 14.2% and revenue growth of 6.5% (FactSet). Analyst ratings and price targets are difficult to find directly for the index itself. However, Goldman Sachs (GS), a component of the S&P 500, has an average 12-month price target of $634.13 (TipRanks). S&P Global (SPGI) has a consensus price target of $511.96 (Benzinga). StockInvest.us predicts a -12.86% fall in the next 3 months. Data from Yahoo Finance, Motley Fool, YCharts, FactSet, TipRanks, and Benzinga.
